quote: Valek coalesced from the shadows and wrapped me in his long lean arms. I soaked in his musky smell, listening to his heart beat. Strong and steady. No indication that he had been sneaking around.
quote_letters: VALEK COALESCED FROM THE SHADOWS AND WRAPPED ME IN HIS LONG LEAN ARMS I SOAKED IN HIS MUSKY SMELL LISTENING TO HIS HEART BEAT STRONG AND STEADY NO INDICATION THAT HE HAD BEEN SNEAKING AROUND
